name: Sustainability City
description: ‘Sustainability City’ is a strategic city-building game that is designed to educate the user about the importance of a triple (environmental, economic and social) bottom line approach to urban development. Build an exciting and wealthy city of the highest calibre by encouraging residential, commercial and industrial development and combat the harsh environment impact that it will have by planting sufficient forests, building environmentally friendly power plants and researching advanced methods of air filtration. Sustainability City is truly an immersive, enjoyable and fun way of learning!
